title: Set your timeline
subtitle: A suggested timeline of 10 working days is already entered below. This takes the process up to when suppliers have submitted their responses, and allows a further 6 working days for you to decide what to do next and confirm that to the suppliers.
subtitle2: The clarification period is when suppliers can ask you further questions before submitting their information. You must meet the deadline you set for responding to their questions.
subtitle3: You can change the length of time for each section to more suitable times for you. It is recommended you set your times no later than 4pm on a weekday in case you need to contact CCS about your project
subtitleDA: The dates and times form a suggested timeline for a simple procurement. You can amend them to suit your own requirements.
subtitleDA1: It's recommended that you set your times no later than 4pm on weekday. This is in case you need to contact CCS about your project.

backJump.title: Return to Write and publish your requirements

body.p1: This will always show the current date.
